description: Returns a paginated list of the pull request's comments.

parameters.description: This can either be the username or the UUID of the account, surrounded by curly-braces, for example: `{account UUID}`. An account is either a team or user.
parameters.name: username

parameters.description: This can either be the repository slug or the UUID of the repository, surrounded by curly-braces, for example: `{repository UUID}`.
parameters.name: repo_slug

parameters.description: The id of the pull request.
parameters.name: pull_request_id

200.description: A paginated list of comments made on the given pull request, in reverse chronological order.

403.description: If the authenticated user does not have access to the pull request.

404.description: If the pull request does not exist.
